items.sentence: I found the book at that bookstore by chance.
I have five copies, but I need twice as many.
We've all done things that we wish we hadn't.
The information Tom gave us was enlightening.
The sooner we start, the sooner we'll finish.
She slowly disappeared into the foggy forest.
He looked for every possible means of escape.
I fell asleep before I saw your last message.
Tom covered his head with a pillow and cried.
Tom and Mary recommended books to each other.
